description:
Kirishima Tooru was accustomed to solving all problems through violence and was called “the Demon of Sakuragi.” One day, the boss of the Sakuragi family suddenly summons Kirishima and appoints him caretaker of his only daughter, Yaeka! A heartwarming comedy about a yakuza crime family’s right-hand man and the boss’ only daughter. The two of them are about to begin their new daily lives together!

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)
synonyms: Con Gái Ông Trùm Và Người Giám Hộ

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Yakuza
tags.description: Centered around Japanese organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

__Anchor__ is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer and lyricist. He is a part of the music unit [ZiNG](https://anilist.co/staff/156742).

__Anchor__ is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer and lyricist. He is a part of the music unit [ZiNG](https://anilist.co/staff/156742).

[Profile](https://neo-porte.jp/vtuber/shibuya-haru.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ShibuyaHAL) | [Twitter (Sub Account)](https://twitter.com/ShibuyaSub) | [YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/HALchannel)

Shibuya HAL (渋谷ハル) is a male Japanese Virtual YouTuber currently part of Neo-Porte, an agency he founded in 2021 alongside [Mafumafu](https://anilist.co/staff/128376/Mafumafu), [Soraru](https://anilist.co/staff/119382/Soraru) and CR Ojiji.

He streams on YouTube and Twitch. He mostly plays PUBG and Apex Legends. He also organises PUBG and Apex Legends competitions for other Virtual YouTubers.

Debuting in 2018 as an independent vtuber, from 31 May 2019, he was affiliated with upd8 until the project's disbandment in 31 December 2020. Between that time and October 2021, he was independent again, until he founded Neo-Porte. On 26 April 2022, HAL announced that he is joining TSM eSports team as streamer.
